description: Updates the metadata location for a table. The metadata location of a table must be an S3 URI that begins with the table's warehouse location. The metadata location for an Apache Iceberg table must end with .metadata.json, or if the metadata file is Gzip-compressed, .metadata.json.gz. You must have the s3tables:UpdateTableMetadataLocation permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

parameters.name: versionToken
parameters.description: The version token of the table.

parameters.name: metadataLocation
parameters.description: The new metadata location for the table.

nested_items.name: tableARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace the table is associated with.

nested_items.name: versionToken
nested_items.description: The version token of the table.

nested_items.name: metadataLocation
nested_items.description: The metadata location of the table.
